description: Smartwool's Men's Intraknit™ Merino 200 3/4 Bottom is the next garment that's helping us revolutionize the base layer industry. It packs all of the comfort and performance-enhancing design that comes from our cutting-edge engineered construction and 3D mapping, but now in a more versatile length. Get yourself a pair of these base layer pants and feel prepared to take on whatever cool to warm weather adventures lie ahead.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Merino 200 3/4 Bottoms - Mens
